author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERIN STRENGTHENING WHILE MOVING WESTWARD... ...FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY TOMORROW...
summary: ...ERIN STRENGTHENING WHILE MOVING WESTWARD... ...FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY TOMORROW... As of 11:00 AM AST Thu Aug 14 the center of Erin was located near 16.4, -49.7 with movement W at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ERIN STRENGTHENING WHILE MOVING WESTWARD... ...FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY TOMORROW... As of 11:00 AM AST Thu Aug 14 the center of Erin was located near 16.4, -49.7 with movement W at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Erin (AT5/AL052025)
